---
name: Add new website
about: Use this template for adding a new website.
title: Add <website name>'
---

<!--  Edit the string values in the template value to add the details of your website: -->

```lisp
 (:name "Your first name and last name"
  :site "https://example.com/"
  :blog "https://example.com/blog/ (Only if you have a separate blog URL)"
  :feed "https://example.com/feed.xml"
  :about "https://example.com/about/"
  :now "https://example.com/now/"
  :hnuid "example (Your HN user ID)"
  :bio "A brief third-person description of yourself, not exceeding 80 characters.")
```

<!--

MAKE SURE:

- The website fits this criteria: https://github.com/hnpwd/hnpwd.github.io#criteria
- To follow this format: https://github.com/hnpwd/hnpwd.github.io#add-via-pr

-->
